links.title: Threshold of originality - Wikipedia

links.description: From 2015 onwards this chart shows the UN Population Division projections.

links.title: Children per woman
links.description: Shown is the 'total fertility rate' (TFR). The TFR is the number of children that would be born to a woman if she were to live to the end of her childbearing years and bear children in accordance with age-specific fertility rates of the specified year.

links.title: Famines
links.description: A famine is an acute episode of extreme hunger that results in excess mortality. Famines have always occurred as the result of a complex mix of ‚Äòtechnical‚Äô and ‚Äòpolitical‚Äô factors. How has the frequency of famines changed over time? Explore our global and country-level database and visualizations of famines.

links.title: Accelerating dynamics of collective attention
links.description: The impacts of technological development on social sphere lack strong empirical foundation. Here the authors presented quantitative analysis of the phenomenon of social acceleration across a range of digital datasets and found that interest appears in bursts that dissipate on decreasing timescales and occur with increasing frequency.
links.original_title: Accelerating Dynamics of Collective Attention
